title: Ber86
author: Ber86
created_time: July 09, 2022, 06:50:16 PMLast edit: July 02, 2023, 08:08:58 PM by Ber86
content: Good afternoon, I hereby request a loan.  As we have no collateral to present, we are willing to mortgage a part of our project, it is one of the solutions to make it viable.  Please do not condemn our action or our loan request as we are trying our best. Adonx Exchanger is a CEX, with unique features, the project was architected 1 years ago, and has been developed in the last few months, we are in the final pre-launch phase.  We have faced many challenges, but we are not willing to give up.  Adonx is the platform's token is an ERC-20 with a supply of 21 million tokens. We did an ICO, and an IEO, with low participation in 2021, in which we raised approximately 20ETH, in total we sold about 300k Adonx tokens.  The funds have been used to fund the platform.You can check more about Adonx token here on Bitcointalk thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5320459.0 The proposal then is as follows, we can provide the following conditions as an investment or loan. 5BTC/100000USDT loan for a period of one year with a waiting period of 6 months, as below: Loan Amount: 5wBTC/100000USDT Reason for Taking out a Loan: Business Adonx CEX( launching in a few days from loan) Amount to be repaid: Same amount in BTC + the fees and interest to agree upon in BTC Repayment Date: after 6 months as follows: January 1.10BTC + 25000 Adonx Febuary 1.10BTC + 25000 Adonx March   1.10BTC + 25000 Adonx April       1.10BTC + 25000 Adonx May       1.10BTC + 25000 Adonx Type of Collateral: Adonx 2500000 (12% Supply) wBTC Address for loan (5BTC): 0xF0d71c4BA1aE0bd305dCD28f00c8EAC118eaDc71 (our smartcontract address for usdt/wBTC) Adonx Address (return after loan (2375000 Adonx)): 0xF0d71c4BA1aE0bd305dCD28f00c8EAC118eaDc71 Repaying earlier keeps interest ie 0.50BTC Interest plus 125000 Adonx, If the funds have not been paid on the respective date/order, you have the consent and right to partially or fully liquidate the total amount of 2500000 Adonx. Please note that we ask for a waiting period of 6 months to consolidate the platform in the market. The funds will be used for launch marketing, fund the platform in the waiting period. In addition to these advantages, we offer the investment/loan a percentage of our business/volume/fees, 5% until we clear off the loan (for loan) and for investor 5% not limited to be paid monthly. For more references you can check Platform Progress https://ibb.co/nbS7W5T https://ibb.co/YP61qzP https://ibb.co/NLzVTdJ https://ibb.co/ygmcmDQ Whitepaper: https://docdro.id/SMyKQXZ
